SA15dhkprvku:439: 02179 hetv-antara-anumānaṃ syān na etan nityeṣu vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:441: 02180 nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:442: 02180 taikṣṇya-ādīnāṃ yathā na asti kāraṇaṃ kaṇḍaka-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:443: 02181 tathā akāraṇam etat syād iti kecit pracakṣate
SA15dhkprvku:444: 02181 saty eva yasmin yaj janma vikāre vā api vikriyā
SA15dhkprvku:445: 02182 tat tasya kāraṇaṃ prāhus tat teṣām api vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:447: 02183 nityānāṃ pratiṣedhena na īśvara-ādeś ca sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:451: 02185 yato api prāṇinaḥ kāma-vibhava-icche ca te mate
SA15dhkprvku:457: 02188 imān tu yuktiman vicchan bādhate sva-mataṃ svayam
SA15dhkprvku:459: 02189 sabhāga-jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇatve api na uditam
SA15dhkprvku:460: 02189 ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna-preraṇād bhave
SA15dhkprvku:461: 02190 ānantaryān na karma api sati tasminn asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:464: 02191 yāvad ātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati
SA15dhkprvku:465: 02192 tāvad duḥkhitam āropya na ca svastho avatiṣṭhate
SA15dhkprvku:474: 02196 mohaś ca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattva-graho vinā
SA15dhkprvku:475: 02197 tena ādya-hetau na dveṣo na doṣo ataḥ kṛpā matā
SA15dhkprvku:477: 02198 akṣīṇa-śaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:478: 02198 mandatvāt karuṇāyāś ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān
SA15dhkprvku:479: 02199 tiṣṭhanty eva para-adhīnāḥ yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā
SA15dhkprvku:480: 02199 satkāyadṛṣṭer vigamād ādya eva abhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:481: 02200 mārge cet sahaja-ahāner na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:482: 02200 sukhī bhave ayaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:483: 02201 yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajaṃ sattva-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:484: 02201 na hy apaśyann aham iti snihyaty ātmani kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:485: 02202 na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha-kāmo abhidhāvati
SA15dhkprvku:486: 02202 duḥkha-utpādasya hetutvaṃ bandho nityasya tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:488: 02203 anityatvena yo avācyaḥ sa heturn na hi kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:489: 02204 bandha-mokṣāv avācye api na vidyete kathaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:490: 02204 nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati
SA15dhkprvku:491: 02205 tyaktvā imāṃ hrepaṇīṃ dṛṣṭim ato nityaḥ sa ucyatām
SA15dhkprvku:492: 02205 ukto mārgasya tad abhyāsād āśrayaḥ parivartate
SA15dhkprvku:493: 02206 sātmye api doṣa-bhāvaś cen mārgavan na avibhutvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:494: 02206 viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:495: 02207 gṛhyate so asya janako vidyamāna-ātmanā iti ca
SA15dhkprvku:496: 02207 eṣā prakṛtir asyās tan nimitta-antarataḥ skhalat
SA15dhkprvku:498: 02208 prabhāsvaram idaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā āgantavo malāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:499: 02209 tat-prāg apy asamarthānāṃ paścāc śaktiḥ kva tanmaye
SA15dhkprvku:500: 02209 na alaṃ praroḍhum atyantaṃ syandinyām agni-vad bhuvi
SA15dhkprvku:503: 02211 na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat pakṣa-pātataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:505: 02212 rāga-pratighayor bādhā bhede api na parasparam
SA15dhkprvku:507: 02213 tan-mūlāś ca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:510: 02214 vyākhyeyo atra virodho yas tad-virodhāc ca tanmayaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:515: 02217 sa ātmatvena anapāyatvād anekāntāc ca bhasma-vat
SA15dhkprvku:516: 02217 yaḥ paśyaty ātmānaṃ tatra aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:517: 02218 snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃs tiraskurute
SA15dhkprvku:518: 02218 guṇa-darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tat sādhanāny upādatte
SA15dhkprvku:519: 02219 tena ātma-abhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre
SA15dhkprvku:522: 02220 niyamena ātmani snihyaṃs tadīye na virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:523: 02221 na ca asty ātmani nirdoṣe sneha-apagama-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:524: 02221 snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:525: 02222 adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:527: 02223 tayor adṛṣṭir viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:528: 02223 na hi sneha-guṇāt snehaḥ kiṃ tv artha-guṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:529: 02224 kāraṇe avikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate
SA15dhkprvku:530: 02224 kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha-samāśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:531: 02225 tathā api na virāgo atra svatva-dṛṣṭer yathā ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:532: 02225 na tair vinā duḥkha-hetur ātmā cet te api tādṛśāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:533: 02226 nirdoṣaṃ dvayam apy evaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayos tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:535: 02227 ātmīya-buddhi-hānyā atra tyāgo na tu viparyaye
SA15dhkprvku:537: 02228 svatva-dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:539: 02229 cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhir jāyate anyatra saspṛhā
SA15dhkprvku:541: 02230 sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭāv api na hīyate
SA15dhkprvku:543: 02231 duḥkha-upakārān na bhaved aṅgulyām iva cet sva-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:544: 02231 na hy ekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣa-anna-vat
SA15dhkprvku:549: 02234 yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśaṃ katham icchati
SA15dhkprvku:551: 02235 icchet prema kathaṃ premṇaḥ prakṛtir na hi tādṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:552: 02235 sarvathā ātma-grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayaty alam
SA15dhkprvku:555: 02237 vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛnoti ca
SA15dhkprvku:556: 02237 ātmany api virāgaś cet na idānīṃ yo virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:557: 02238 tyajaty asau yathā ātmānaṃ vyarthā ato duḥkha-bhāvanā
SA15dhkprvku:558: 02238 duḥkha-bhāvanayā apy eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet
SA15dhkprvku:559: 02239 pratyakṣaṃ pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:560: 02239 yady apy ekatra doṣeṇa tat kṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:561: 02240 viraktau na eva tatra api kāmi iva vanita-antare
SA15dhkprvku:562: 02240 tyājya-upādeya-bhede hi saktir yā eva eka-bhāvinī
SA15dhkprvku:565: 02242 etāvad eva ca jagat kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:566: 02242 sadoṣatā api cet tatra tasya tatra ātmany api sā samā
SA15dhkprvku:567: 02243 tatra aviraktas tad-doṣe kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:569: 02244 sa ca indriya-ādau na tv evaṃ bāla-āder api darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:570: 02244 doṣavaty api sadbhāvāt svabhāvād guṇavaty api
SA15dhkprvku:572: 02245 tata eva ca na ātmīya-buddher api guṇa-īkṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:573: 02246 kāraṇaṃ hīyate sa api tasmān na aguṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:574: 02246 api ca asad guṇa-āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:575: 02247 tasmāt ta kāraṇā bādhī vidhis taṃ bādhate katham
SA15dhkprvku:577: 02248 indriya-ādeḥ pṛthag bhūtam ātmānaṃ vetty ayaṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:578: 02248 tasmān na ekatva-dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:580: 02249 pratyutpannā tu yo duḥkhān nirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:581: 02250 na vairāgyaṃ tadā apy asya sneho avasthā-antar eṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:583: 02251 tasminn nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svām eva bhajate punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:587: 02253 sā ca naḥ pratyaya-utpattiḥ sā nairātmya-dṛg-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:589: 02254 anityāt prāha tena eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhān nirātmatām
SA15dhkprvku:591: 02255 so amuktaḥ kleśa-karmabhyāṃ saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:592: 02255 ātmīyam eva yo na icched bhoktā apy asya na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:593: 02256 ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā-bhogau hi lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:598: 02258 na alaṃ bīja-ādi-saṃsiddho vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane
SA15dhkprvku:600: 02259 prāg guror lāghavāt paścān na pāpa-haraṇaṃ kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:601: 02260 mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpaṃ gurv-amūrtitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:603: 02261 hīna-sthāna-gatir janma tena tacchin na jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:604: 02261 tayor eva hi sāmarthyaṃ jātau tan-mātra-bhavataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:605: 02262 te cetane svayaṃ karma ity akhaṇḍaṃ janma-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:607: 02263 adṛṣṭa-nāśād agatis tat saṃskāro na cetanā
SA15dhkprvku:609: 02264 dṛṣṭaṃ buddhern na ca anyasya tāni santi na santi kim
SA15dhkprvku:611: 02265 na syus teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā-ādy-anantaram
SA15dhkprvku:612: 02265 atha buddhes tadā abhāvān na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:613: 02266 buddhes teṣām asāmarthye jīvato api syur akṣamāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:617: 02268 kriyāyām akriyāyāṃ ca kriyā ca sadṛśa-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:618: 02268 aikyaṃ ca hetu-phalayor vyatireke tatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:619: 02269 kartṛ-bhoktṛtva-hāniḥ syāt sāmarthyaṃ ca na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:621: 02270 asmṛteḥ kasyacit tena hy anubhūteḥ smṛta-udbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:622: 02270 sthiraṃ sukhaṃ mama ahaṃ ca ity ādi satya-catuṣṭaye
SA15dhkprvku:625: 02272 hanti sā anucarāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ samyag-dṛṣṭiḥ subhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:626: 02272 tri-hetorn na udbhavaḥ karma-dehayoḥ sthitayor api
SA15dhkprvku:627: 02273 eka-abhāvād vinā bījaṃ na aṅkurasya iva janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:629: 02274 aśakyatvāc ca tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punar udbhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:630: 02274 dvaya-kṣaya-arthaṃ yatne ca vyarthaḥ karma-kṣaye śramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:632: 02275 karmaṇāṃ tāpa-saṃkleśāt na eka-rūpāt tataḥ kṣayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:633: 02276 phalaṃ kathaṃcit taj-janyam alpaṃ syān na vijātimat
SA15dhkprvku:636: 02277 yadi iṣṭam aparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet
SA15dhkprvku:637: 02278 tat karma-phalam ity asmān na śakteḥ saṃkara-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:639: 02279 tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛta-hāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:640: 02279 doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:641: 02280 mithyā-vikalpena vinā na abhilāṣaḥ sukhād api
SA15dhkprvku:646: 02282 dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:647: 02283 tac ca abhiyogavān vaktuṃ yatas tasmāt pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:650: 02284 prayoga-darśanād vā asya yat kiṃcid udaya-ātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:651: 02285 nirodha-dharmakaṃ sarvaṃ tad ity ādāv anekadhā
SA15dhkprvku:653: 02285 vyāpti-pradarśanād hetoḥ sādhyena uktaṃ ca tat sphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:660: 03004 aśaktaṃ sarvam iti ced bīja-āder aṅkura-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:661: 03004 dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:662: 03005 sā asti sarvatra ced buddher na anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:667: 03007 jñeyatvena grahād doṣo na abhāveṣu prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:669: 03008 jñāna-rūpatayā arthatvāt keśa-ādi iti matiḥ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:677: 03012 sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttir arthe cet syān na sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:678: 03013 deśa-bhrāntiś ca na jñāne tulyam utpattito dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:685: 03016 ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānān nāma-ādy etena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:686: 03017 sā eva iṣṭa-arthavatī kena cakṣur-ādi-matir matā
SA15dhkprvku:689: 03018 atīta-anāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syād arthena tat kṣayāt
SA15dhkprvku:691: 03019 tan na kevala-sāmānya-agrahaṇād grahaṇe api vā
SA15dhkprvku:693: 03020 nityatvāc ca yadi vyaktir vyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:694: 03021 ātmani jñāna-janane yac śaktaṃ śaktam eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:695: 03021 atha aśaktaṃ kadācic ced aśaktaṃ sarvadā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:696: 03022 tasya śaktir aśaktir vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
SA15dhkprvku:697: 03022 nityatvād acikitsyasya kas tāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:699: 03023 nīla-ādy-ākāra-leśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:700: 03024 pratyakṣa-pratyaya-arthatvān na akṣāṇāṃ vyarthatā iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:701: 03024 sā eva eka-rūpāc śabda-āder bhinna-ābhāsā matiḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:702: 03025 na jātir jātimad vyakti-rūpaṃ yena apara-āśrayam
SA15dhkprvku:703: 03025 siddhaṃ pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hy apekṣā ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:706: 03027 anyatve tad asambaddhaṃ siddhā ato niḥsvabhāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:707: 03027 jāti-prasaṅgo abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:710: 03029 tasyāṃ rūpa-avabhāso yas tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:713: 03030 yan niṣṭhās ta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:715: 03031 artha-bhrāntir api iṣyeta sāmānyaṃ sā apy abhiplavāt
SA15dhkprvku:716: 03032 artha-rūpatayā tattvena abhāvāc ca na rūpiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:718: 03033 yadi vastu na vastūnām avācyatvaṃ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:722: 03035 upacārāt tad iṣṭaṃ ced vartamāna-ghaṭasya kā
SA15dhkprvku:723: 03035 pratyāsattir abhāvena yā paṭa-ādau na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:725: 03036 siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇā apy asti laukikī
SA15dhkprvku:726: 03037 yatra rūḍhyā asad-artho api janaiḥ śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:727: 03037 sa mukhyas tatra tat-sāmyād gauṇo anyatra skhalad gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:728: 03038 yathābhāve apy abhāva-ākhyāṃ yathā-kalpanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:729: 03038 kuryād aśakte śakte vā pradhāna-ādi-śrutiṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:730: 03039 śabdebhyo yādṛśī buddhir naṣṭe anaṣṭe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:731: 03039 tādṛśy eva sad-arthānāṃ na etac śrotṛ-ādi-cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:733: 03040 tasya api kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam
SA15dhkprvku:735: 03041 rūpaṃ dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad-vastv ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:736: 03042 tābhyāṃ tad-anyad eva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:737: 03042 tayor iti na sambandho vyāvṛttis tu na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:738: 03043 tasmāt samānatā eva asmin sāmānye avastu-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:739: 03043 kāryaṃ ca tad anekaṃ syān naśvaraṃ ca tan-matam
SA15dhkprvku:742: 03045 yac ca vastu-balāj jñānaṃ jāyate tad apekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:743: 03045 na saṃketaṃ na sāmānya-buddhiṣv etad vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:744: 03046 yā apy abheda-anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu-dvaye kṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:747: 03047 jñāna-kāryeṣu jātir vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:749: 03048 yadi nāma indriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tad-vapuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:751: 03049 vyakti-grahe ca tac śabda-rūpād anyan na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:753: 03050 tad ayogyatayā arūpaṃ tad hy avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:757: 03052 na ukta-uttaratvād dṛṣṭatvād atīta-ādiṣu ca anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:759: 03053 taj-jñānam ity adoṣo ayaṃ meyaṃ tv ekaṃ svalakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:763: 03055 gatiś cet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:765: 03056 gatir apy anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaś ca ayaṃ kṛta-uttaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:771: 03059 tasya svatantraṃ grahaṇam ato anyad vastv atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:773: 03060 tad-āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakas tadā
SA15dhkprvku:775: 03061 tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo artho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:776: 03062 yā ca sambandhino dharmād gatir dharmiṇi jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:777: 03062 sā anumānaṃ parokṣāṇām ekaṃ tena eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:781: 03064 ekam eva aprameyatvād asataś cen mataṃ ca naḥ
SA15dhkprvku:783: 03065 tan niścaya-pramāṇaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ na akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:786: 03067 abhāve vinivṛttiś cet pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:787: 03067 viruddhaṃ sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:791: 03069 na āśvāsa iti cel liṅgaṃ durdṛṣṭer atad īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:792: 03070 yataḥ kadācit siddhā asya pratītir vastunaḥ kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:793: 03070 tad avaśyaṃ tato jātaṃ tat svabhāvo api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:794: 03071 sva-nimittaṃ svabhāvaṃ vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:795: 03071 yac ca rūpaṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:797: 03072 anyeṣu satsv adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:800: 03074 tac ca na indriya-śakty-ādāv akṣa-buddher asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:803: 03075 vikalpena na sāmānya-grahas tasmiṃs tato anumā
SA15dhkprvku:805: 03076 pramāṇam anyat tad buddhir vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:807: 03077 tat pramāṇa-antaraṃ meya-bahutvād bahutā api vā
SA15dhkprvku:808: 03078 pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtter ekatra vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:811: 03079 yojanād varṇa-sāmānye na ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
SA15dhkprvku:812: 03080 na avastu rūpaṃ tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:813: 03080 anyatra na anya-siddhiś cen na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:814: 03081 yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tādṛg liṅga-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:815: 03081 hetus tajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅgi-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:821: 03084 nimittaṃ tat svabhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ tac ca tad dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:823: 03085 siddhiṃ pramāṇair vadatām arthād eva viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:825: 03086 niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇatva-sūcanā
SA15dhkprvku:826: 03087 anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva-uktyā parasya tat
SA15dhkprvku:827: 03087 na astitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhāc ced asāv api
SA15dhkprvku:828: 03088 siddhaḥ kena asahasthānād iti cet tat kuto matam
SA15dhkprvku:829: 03088 dṛśyasya darśana-abhāvād iti cet sā apramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:830: 03089 tasmāt sva-śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā
SA15dhkprvku:831: 03089 yasyā pramāṇaṃ sā avācyo niṣedhas tena sarvathā
SA15dhkprvku:833: 03090 prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatra artho na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:834: 03091 viruddhaṃ tac ca sā upāyam avidhāyā api dhāya ca
SA15dhkprvku:835: 03091 pramāṇa-uktir niṣedhe yā na sā nyāyānusāriṇī
SA15dhkprvku:839: 03093 tādṛśo anupalabdheś ced ucyatāṃ sā eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:842: 03095 bhinno abhinno api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:843: 03095 yathā agnir ahime sādhye sattā vā janma-bādhanī
SA15dhkprvku:844: 03096 yathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:845: 03096 tathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sva-nivṛttau nivartakam
SA15dhkprvku:848: 03098 tatra api vyāpako dharmo nivṛtter gamako mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:850: 03099 yad apramāṇatā abhāve liṅgaṃ tasya eva kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:853: 03100 tac ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśyatayā mate
SA15dhkprvku:854: 03101 anumānād anitya-āder grahaṇe ayaṃ kramo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:855: 03101 prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta-grahaṇān matam
SA15dhkprvku:856: 03102 na anyās yā anityatā bhāvāt pūrva-siddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt
SA15dhkprvku:857: 03102 na aneka-rūpo vācyo asau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:859: 03103 tad-asiddhau tathā asya eva hy anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:869: 03108 buddhayo arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna-āśrayā iva
SA15dhkprvku:870: 03109 yathā-codanam ākhyāś ca so asati bhrānti-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:872: 03110 siddho atra apy athavā dhvaṃso liṅgād anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:873: 03110 prāg bhūtvā hy abhavad bhāvo anitya ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:875: 03111 anityatā śrutis tena tāvantāv iti kau smṛtau
SA15dhkprvku:876: 03112 prāk paścād apy abhāvaś cet sa eva anityatā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:877: 03112 ṣaṣṭhy-ādy-ayogād iti ced antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:879: 03113 aviśeṣaṇam eva syād antau cet kārya-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:880: 03114 asambandhān na bhāvasya prāg-abhāvaṃ sa vāñchati
SA15dhkprvku:881: 03114 tad-upādhi-samākhyāne te apy asya ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:883: 03115 sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryam atha iha kim
SA15dhkprvku:884: 03116 yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāg-abhāvavān
SA15dhkprvku:890: 03119 nidarśanaṃ tad eva iti sāmānya-agrahaṇaṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:891: 03119 nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:892: 03120 vismṛtatvād adoṣaś cet tad eva anidarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:896: 03122 sandhīyamānaṃ ca anyena vyavasāyaṃ smṛtiṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:897: 03122 tal-liṅga-apekṣaṇān no cet smṛtir na vyabhicārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:901: 03124 sthito api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:902: 03125 punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīn me kalpanā īdṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:903: 03125 icchā ca iti na pūrva-ukta-avasthāyām indriyād gatau
SA15dhkprvku:904: 03126 ekatra dṛṣṭo bhedo hi kvacin na anyatra dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:905: 03126 na tasmāt bhinnam asty anyat sāmānyaṃ buddhy-abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:906: 03127 tasmād viśeṣa-viṣayā sarvā eva indriyajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:909: 03128 viṣayo yaś ca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:910: 03129 asya idam iti sambandhe yāv arthau pratibhāsinau
SA15dhkprvku:911: 03129 tayor eva hi sambandho na tadā indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:914: 03131 cakṣuṣo artha-avabhāse api yaṃ paro asya iti śaṃsati
SA15dhkprvku:915: 03131 sa eva yojyate śabdairn na khalv indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:919: 03133 vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyayasyati
SA15dhkprvku:921: 03134 iti ced bhinna-jātīya-vikalpe anyasya vā katham
SA15dhkprvku:923: 03135 anyatra api samānaṃ tad varṇayor vā sakṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:924: 03136 sakṛt saṃgata-sarva-artheṣv indriyeṣv iha satsv api
SA15dhkprvku:925: 03136 pañcabhir vyavadhāne api bhāty avyavahita iva yā
SA15dhkprvku:927: 03137 vicchinna-ābhā iti tac citraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛd dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:929: 03138 śuddhe mano-vikalpe ca na krama-grahaṇam bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:930: 03139 yo agrahaḥ saṃgate apy arthe kvacid āsakta-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:931: 03139 saktyā anya-utpatti-vaiguṇyāc codyaṃ vā etad dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:933: 03140 cakra-bhrāntiṃ dṛśā dhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā
SA15dhkprvku:935: 03141 āhur bālā vikalpe ca hetuṃ saṃketa-mandatām
SA15dhkprvku:936: 03142 teṣāṃ pratyakṣam eva syād bālānām avikalpanāt
SA15dhkprvku:937: 03142 saṃketa-upāya-vigamāt paścād api bhaven na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:938: 03143 mano avyutpanna-saṃketam asti tena sa cen mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:939: 03143 evam indriyaje api syād śeṣavac ca idam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:940: 03144 yad eva sādhanaṃ bāle tad eva atra api kathyatām
SA15dhkprvku:942: 03145 viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca sambandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim
SA15dhkprvku:943: 03145 gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:945: 03146 tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā apy atra na asty ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:946: 03147 yady apy anvayi vijñānaṃ śabda-vyakty-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:948: 03148 samānatve api tasya eva na īkṣaṇaṃ netra-gocaram
SA15dhkprvku:951: 03149 paṭas tantuṣv iha ity ādi-śabdāś ca ime svayaṃ kṛtāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:952: 03150 śṛṅgaṅ gavi iti loke syāc śṛṅge gaur ity alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:954: 03151 tais tantubhir iyaṃ śāṭi ity uttaraṃ kāryam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:957: 03152 tantv-ākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayaṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:960: 03154 anumānaṃ ca jāty-ādau vastuno na asti bhedini
SA15dhkprvku:961: 03154 sarvatra vyapadeśo hi daṇḍa-āder api sāṃvṛtāt
SA15dhkprvku:963: 03155 geho yady api saṃyogas tan mālā kiṃ nu tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:964: 03156 jātiś ced geha eko api mālā ity ucyeta vṛkṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:965: 03156 mālā-bahutve tac śabdaḥ kathaṃ jāter ajātitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:966: 03157 mālā-ādau ca mahattva-ādir iṣṭo yaś ca aupacārikaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:969: 03158 padārtha-śabdaḥ kaṃ hetum anyaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ samīkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:970: 03159 yo yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhas tat-sāmya-ādyas tathā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:971: 03159 mukhyo gauṇaś ca bhāveṣv apy abhāvasya upacārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:972: 03160 saṃketa-anvayinī rūḍhir vaktur icchā anvayī ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:975: 03161 bhede api yatra taj-jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate
SA15dhkprvku:977: 03162 ity etat kārya-viśleṣasya anvayo na eka-vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:978: 03163 vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tan niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:982: 03165 vyatirekī iva yaj jñāne bhāty artha-pratibimbakam
SA15dhkprvku:983: 03165 śabdāt tad api na artha-ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā-udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:984: 03166 tasya abhidhāne śrutibhir arthe ko aṃśo avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:985: 03166 tasya agatau ca saṃketa-kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:986: 03167 śabdo artha-aṃśakam āha iti tatra anyāpoha ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:987: 03167 ākāraḥ sa ca na arthe asti tam vadann artha-bhāk katham
SA15dhkprvku:988: 03168 śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:991: 03169 śabda-artho arthaḥ sa eva iti vacanena virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:993: 03170 anuyānti imam artha-aṃśam iti vā apoha-kṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:997: 03172 śrutau sambadhyate apoho na etad vastuni yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:998: 03173 tasmāj jāty-ādi-tad-yogā na arthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1002: 03175 anyatra gata-citto api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1003: 03175 tat saṃketa-agrahas tatra spaṣṭas tajjā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1004: 03176 jāyante kalpanās tatra yatra śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1005: 03176 tena icchātaḥ pravarteran na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣajāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1006: 03177 rūpaṃ rūpam iti īkṣeta tad dhiyaṃ kim iti īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1007: 03177 asti ca anubhavas tasyāḥ so avikalpaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1008: 03178 tasya eva anubhave dṛṣṭaṃ na vikalpa-dvayaṃ sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1010: 03179 smṛtir bhaved atīte ca sā agṛhīte kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1013: 03180 siddhaṃ tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam
SA15dhkprvku:1015: 03181 rūpa-ādir iva gṛhyeta na syāt tat pūrva-dhī-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1018: 03183 sāmānya-vācinaḥ śabdās tad eka-arthā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1020: 03184 asti cen nirvikalpaṃ ca kiṃcit tat-tulya-hetukam
SA15dhkprvku:1021: 03184 sarvan tathā eva hetor hi bhedād bhedaḥ phala-ātmanām
SA15dhkprvku:1023: 03185 tathā anapekṣya samayaṃ vastu-śaktyā eva netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1025: 03186 anapekṣya na cec śakyaṃ syāt smṛtāv eva liṅga-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1026: 03187 tasyās tat-saṃgama-utpatter akṣa-dhīḥ syāt smṛter na vā
SA15dhkprvku:1027: 03187 tataḥ kāla-antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:1028: 03188 krameṇa ubhaya-hetuś cet prāg eva syād abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1029: 03188 anyo akṣa-buddhi-hetuś cet smṛtis tatra apy anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1031: 03189 bhedaś ca asamito grāhyaḥ smṛtis tatra kim arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1033: 03190 tasmāc cakṣuś ca rūpāṃ ca pratītya udeti netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1034: 03191 sākṣāc cet jñāna-janane samartho viṣayo akṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1035: 03191 atha kasmād dvaya-adhīna-janma tat tena na ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1036: 03192 samīkṣya gamakatvaṃ hi vyapadeśo na gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1037: 03192 tac ca akṣa-vyapadeśe asti tad-dharmaś ca niyojyatām
SA15dhkprvku:1040: 03194 saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatra ca akṣa-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1043: 03195 uktās te saṃcitās te hi nimittāṃ jñāna-janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1044: 03196 aṇūnāṃ sa viśeṣaś ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn
SA15dhkprvku:1046: 03197 atha eka-āyatanatve api na anekaṃ dṛśyate sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1048: 03198 pratyuktaṃ lāghavaṃ ca atra teṣv eva krama-pātiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1049: 03198 kim na akrama-grahas tulya-kālāḥ sarvāś ca buddhayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1050: 03199 kāścit tāsv akrama-ābhāsāḥ kramavatyo aparāś ca kim
SA15dhkprvku:1052: 03200 na ekaṃ citra-pataṃga-ādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham
SA15dhkprvku:1053: 03200 citraṃ tad ekam iti ced idaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1054: 03201 na ekaṃ svabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇi-rūpaṃ yathā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:1056: 03202 tatra avayava-rūpaṃ cet kevalaṃ dṛśyate tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1057: 03202 nīla-ādīni nirasya anyac citraṃ citraṃ yad īkṣase
SA15dhkprvku:1059: 03203 nānā-arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka-arthā akramā aparā
SA15dhkprvku:1061: 03204 tac ced anaṅgaṃ kena iyaṃ siddhā bheda-vyavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1063: 03205 arūpatvān na saṃyogaś citro bhakteś ca na āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1066: 03207 nānā-arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhānto apy avikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1067: 03207 vikalpayann apy eka-arthaṃ yato anyad api paśyati
SA15dhkprvku:1068: 03208 citra-avabhāseṣv artheṣu yady ekatvaṃ na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1069: 03208 sā eva tāvat kathaṃ buddhir ekā citra-avabhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1071: 03209 yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1072: 03210 kiṃ syāt sā citratā ekasyāṃ na syāt tasyāṃ matāv api
SA15dhkprvku:1073: 03210 yadi idaṃ svayam arthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayaṃ
SA15dhkprvku:1074: 03211 tasmān na artheṣu na jñāne sthūla-bhāsas tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1075: 03211 ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1076: 03212 paricchedo antar anyo ayaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1078: 03213 tatra ekasya apy abhāvena dvayam apy avahīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1079: 03213 tasmāt tad eva tasya api tattvaṃ yā dvaya-śūnyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1081: 03214 tad-upaplava-bhāve ca teṣāṃ bhedo apy upaplavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1085: 03216 lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tena apy ete vilakṣaṇāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1093: 03220 aśakya-darśanas taṃ hi pataty arthe vivecayan
SA15dhkprvku:1094: 03221 yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1095: 03221 iti nāma eka-bhāvaḥ syāc citra-ākārasya cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:1097: 03222 vivekī na vivakṣā anyad avivekī ca na īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1098: 03223 ko vā virodho bahavaḥ saṃjāta-atiśayāḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:1099: 03223 bhaveyuḥ kāraṇaṃ buddher yadi na ātma-indriya-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1100: 03224 hetu-bhāvād ṛte na anyā grāhyatā nāma kācana
SA15dhkprvku:1101: 03224 tatra buddhir yad ābhāsā tasyās tad-grāhyam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1102: 03225 kathaṃ vā avayavī grāhyaḥ sakṛt sva-avayavaiḥ saha
SA15dhkprvku:1103: 03225 na hi go-pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnā-ādīnām adarśane
SA15dhkprvku:1105: 03226 sampūrṇa-aṅgo na gṛhyeta sakṛn na api guṇa-ādimān
SA15dhkprvku:1107: 03227 yad aṅga-bhāvena upāttan tat tena eva hi gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1109: 03228 agrahād bheda-buddhiḥ syāt paśyato apy aparāparam
SA15dhkprvku:1111: 03229 astu nāma tathā apy eṣāṃ bhavet sambandhi-saṃkaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1118: 03233 yady apy asti sitatva-ādir yādṛg indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1119: 03233 na so abhidhīyate śabdair jñānayo rūpa-bhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1120: 03234 eka-arthatve api buddhīnāṃ nānā-āśrayatā sa cet
SA15dhkprvku:1121: 03234 śrotṛ-ādi-cittāni idānīṃ bhinna-arthāni iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1122: 03235 jāto nāma āśrayo anyonyaḥ cetasāṃ tasya vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1123: 03235 ekasya eva kuto rūpaṃ bhinna-ākāra-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:1127: 03237 dṛśye gava-ādau jāty-ādes tad apy etena dūṣitam
SA15dhkprvku:1128: 03238 darśanāny eva bhinnāny apy ekāṃ kurvanti kalpanām
SA15dhkprvku:1132: 03240 kṣaṇikatvād atītasya darśane ca na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1135: 03241 karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim iti iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1136: 03242 sakṛd bhāvaś ca sarvāsāṃ dhiyāṃ tadbhāva-janmanām
SA15dhkprvku:1139: 03243 mano anyam eva gṛhṇāti viṣayaṃ na andhadṛk tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1141: 03244 tato anya-grahaṇe apy asya niyata-grāhyatā matā
SA15dhkprvku:1143: 03245 sahakāri bhaved artha iti ced akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1144: 03246 asataḥ prāg asāmarthyāt paścāc ca anupayogataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1145: 03246 prāgbhāvaḥ sarva-hetūnāṃ na ato arthaḥ sva-dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:1146: 03247 bhinna-kālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1148: 03248 kāryaṃ hy aneka-hetutve apy anukurvad udeti yat
SA15dhkprvku:1149: 03248 tat tena arpita-tad-rūpaṃ gṛhītam iti ca ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1152: 03250 avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1156: 03252 sā arthe sati indriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:1157: 03252 dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukha-ādīnāṃ tat-tulyaṃ manasām api
SA15dhkprvku:1158: 03253 asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma-ajanma vā kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:1159: 03253 dṛṣṭaṃ sukha-āder buddher vā ta tato na anyataś ca te
SA15dhkprvku:1162: 03255 yasya arthasya nipātena te jātā dhī-sukha-ādayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1163: 03255 taṃ muktvā pratipadyeta sukha-ādīn eva sā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1165: 03256 tal-lāghavāc cet tat-tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1166: 03257 na ca ekayā dvaya-jñānaṃ niyamād akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1167: 03257 sukha-ādy-abhāve apy arthāc ca jāteḥ tac śakty-asiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1168: 03258 pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayor nīla-ādi-vat sukham
SA15dhkprvku:1170: 03259 na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthena eva saha-grahe
SA15dhkprvku:1171: 03259 kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukha-ādīnāṃ na iṣṭā dhīr yat tad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1173: 03260 rūpa-ādiḥ stry-ādi-bhedo akṣaṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:1174: 03261 na hi saty antaraṅge arthe śakter dhīr bāhya-darśanī
SA15dhkprvku:1178: 03263 saty āntare apy upādāne jñāne duḥkha-ādi-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1179: 03263 na upādānaṃ viruddhasya tac ca ekam iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:1181: 03264 ādhipatyaṃ tu kurvīta tad-viruddhe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1185: 03266 vedakāḥ svātmanaś ca eṣām arthebhyo janma kevalam
SA15dhkprvku:1186: 03267 artha-ātmā svātmabhūto hi teṣāṃ tair anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1188: 03268 kaścid bahiḥ sthitān eva sukha-ādīn apracetanān
SA15dhkprvku:1189: 03268 grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛd yukto dvaya-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1191: 03269 bhinna-avabhāsinor grāhyaṃ cetasos tad abhedi kim
SA15dhkprvku:1193: 03270 tāratamyaṃ ca buddhau syān na prīti-paritāpayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1195: 03271 sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmā iti gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:1197: 03272 agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā
SA15dhkprvku:1199: 03273 grāhyagrāhakatā-abhāvād bhāve anyatra api sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1200: 03274 tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvāc ca cetanāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1201: 03274 saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1202: 03275 atat-svabhāvo anubhavo bauddhāṃs tān samavaiti cet
SA15dhkprvku:1203: 03275 muktvā adhyakṣa-smṛta-ākārāṃ saṃvittiṃ buddhir atra kā
SA15dhkprvku:1205: 03276 ekam āvirbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tv anyad antarā
SA15dhkprvku:1208: 03278 abhinna-vedanasya aikye yan na evaṃ tad-vibheda-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1209: 03278 sidhyed asādhanatve asya na siddhaṃ bheda-sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1211: 03279 abhinna-ābhe vibhinne ced bheda-abhedau kim āśrayau
SA15dhkprvku:1214: 03281 prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanām ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1217: 03282 abhūtān api paśyanti purato avasthitān iva
SA15dhkprvku:1219: 03283 svapne api smaryate smārtaṃ ca tat tādṛg arthavat
SA15dhkprvku:1222: 03285 tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad eva abhibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:1224: 03286 tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇīta-vastu-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1226: 03287 śabda-artha-grāhi yad yatra taj-jñānaṃ tatra kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1227: 03287 svarūpaṃ ca na śabda-arthas tatra adhyakṣam ato akhilam
SA15dhkprvku:1237: 03292 na pratyayo anuyaṃs tac ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1238: 03293 apavādaś caturtho atra tena uktam upaghātajam
SA15dhkprvku:1240: 03294 mānasaṃ tad api ity eke teṣāṃ grantho virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1241: 03294 nīla-dvi-candra-ādi-dhiyāṃ hetur akṣāṇy api ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1244: 03296 kiṃ vā aindriyaṃ yad akṣāṇāṃ bhāva-abhāva-anurodhi cet
SA15dhkprvku:1245: 03296 tat-tulyaṃ vikriyā-vac cet sā iva iyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1246: 03297 sarpa-ādi-bhrānti-vac ca asyāḥ syād akṣa-vikṛtāv api
SA15dhkprvku:1247: 03297 nivṛttir na nivarteta nivṛtte apy akṣa-viplave
SA15dhkprvku:1248: 03298 kadācid anya-santāne tathā eva apy eta vācakaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1250: 03299 suptasya jāgrato vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa-bhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1251: 03299 sā nirvikalpa-ubhayathā apy anyathā eva vikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1252: 03300 tasmāt tasya avikalpe api prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1253: 03300 visaṃvādāt tad-arthaṃ ca pratyakṣa-ābhaṃ dvidhā uditam
SA15dhkprvku:1254: 03301 kriyā-sādhanam ity eva sarvaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1255: 03301 sādhanaṃ na hi tat tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1257: 03302 bhāvyaṃ tena ātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1258: 03303 anātmabhūto bhedo asya vidyamāno api hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1259: 03303 bhinne karmaṇy abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1260: 03304 tasmād yato asya ātma-bhedo asya adhigatir ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1262: 03305 arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvā artha-rūpatām
SA15dhkprvku:1263: 03305 anyaḥ sva-bhedāj jñānasya bhedako api kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1266: 03307 sā ca tasya ātmabhūtā eva tena na artha-antaraṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1267: 03307 dadhānaṃ tac ca tām ātmany artha-adhigamana-ātmanā
SA15dhkprvku:1273: 03310 na iṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyam eteṣāṃ vyavadhānāt kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1274: 03311 sarveṣām upayoge api kārakāṇāṃ kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1275: 03311 yad antyaṃ bhedakaṃ tasyās tat-sādhakatamaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1277: 03312 tad-bhede api hy abhinnasya tasya idam iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1279: 03313 atādrūpye na bhedo api tadvad anya-dhiyo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:1280: 03314 na iṣṭo viṣaya-bhedo api kriyā-sādhanayor dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1281: 03314 eka-arthatve dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ na ca syāt krama-bhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:1284: 03316 sarva-ātmanā api sambaddhaṃ kaiścid eva avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:1285: 03316 dharmaiḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1286: 03317 tad abhede api bhedo ayaṃ yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:1287: 03317 saṃskārāc ced atādrūpye na tasya apy avyavasthiteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1292: 03320 kā artha saṃvid yad eva idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prativedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1294: 03321 atha so anubhavaḥ kva asya tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1295: 03321 sarūpavanti tat kena sthūla-ābhāsaś ca te aṇavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1300: 03324 idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatra avasāya-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1301: 03324 sa tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattir vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1303: 03325 tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭur eṣa viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1304: 03326 ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1306: 03327 na anyo anubhāvyas tena asti tasya na anubhavo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1307: 03327 tasya api tulya-codyatvāt svayaṃ sā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1308: 03328 nīla-ādi-rūpas tasya asau svabhāvo anubhavaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1311: 03329 yathā prakāśo abhimatas tathā dhīr ātma-vedinī
SA15dhkprvku:1312: 03330 tasyāś ca artha-antare vedye durghaṭau vedya-vedakau
SA15dhkprvku:1317: 03332 tadā anya-saṃvido abhāvāt svasaṃvit phalam iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1318: 03333 yadi bāhyo anubhūyeta ko doṣo na eva kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1319: 03333 idam eva kim uktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo artho anubhūyeta
SA15dhkprvku:1320: 03334 yadi buddhis tad-ākārā sā asty ākāra-niveśinī
SA15dhkprvku:1321: 03334 sā bāhyād anyato vā iti vicāram idam arhati
SA15dhkprvku:1323: 03335 darśanaṃ nīla-nirbhāsaṃ na artho bāhyo asti kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1326: 03337 tasmād dvi-rūpam asty ekaṃ yad evam anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1327: 03337 smaryate ca ubhaya-ākārasya asya saṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1328: 03338 yadā niṣpanna-tadbhāva iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1329: 03338 vijñapti-hetur viṣayas tasyāś ca anubhavas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1331: 03339 tadā ya ātma-anubhavaḥ sa eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1332: 03340 yadi iṣṭa-ākāra ātmā syād anyathā vā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1333: 03340 iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā tena bhavaty arthaḥ praveditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1334: 03341 vidyamāne api bāhya-arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1336: 03342 yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1337: 03342 yady agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kiṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1338: 03343 abhyupāye api bhedena na syād anubhavo dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1339: 03343 adṛṣṭa-āvaraṇān no cen na nāma-artha-vaśā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1341: 03344 tad adṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhaved arthasya vedakam
SA15dhkprvku:1343: 03345 aniṣṭa-ādāv asandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra api cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:1344: 03346 tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktaṃ sva-anubhavaḥ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1345: 03346 yataḥ svabhāvo asya yathā tathā eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1346: 03347 tadā artha-ābhāsatā eva asya pramāṇaṃ na tu sann api
SA15dhkprvku:1348: 03348 yasmād yathā niviṣṭo asāv artha-ātmā pratyaye tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1349: 03348 niścīyate niviṣṭo asāv evam ity ātma-saṃvidaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1350: 03349 ity artha-saṃvit sā eva iṣṭā yato artha-ātmā na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1351: 03349 tasyā buddhi-niveśya-arthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā
SA15dhkprvku:1352: 03350 yathā niviśate so arthaḥ tathā hi sa prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1353: 03350 artha-sthites tadātmatvāt svavid apy arthavin matā
SA15dhkprvku:1354: 03351 tasmād viṣaya-bhedo api na svasaṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1356: 03352 tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśo anya-adṛśo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:1357: 03352 jñānasya hetur artho api ity arthasya iṣṭā prameyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1358: 03353 yathā kathaṃcin na asya artha-rūpaṃ yuktyā avabhāsinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1364: 03356 dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpo api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1368: 03358 satyaṃ kathaṃ syur ākārās tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1369: 03359 anyasya anyatva-hāneś ca na abhedo arūpa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1370: 03359 rūpa-abhedaṃ hi paśyantī dhīr abhedaṃ vyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:1371: 03360 bhāvā yena nirūpyante tad-rūpaṃ na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1372: 03360 yasmād ekam anekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:1375: 03362 adarśanāj jagat yasminn ekasya api tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1376: 03362 asti iyam api yā tv antar upaplava-samudbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1380: 03364 tādātmyād ātmavit tasya sa tasyā sādhanaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1383: 03366 tatra apy anubhava-ātmatvāt te yogyāḥ svātmasaṃvidi
SA15dhkprvku:1384: 03366 iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit
SA15dhkprvku:1386: 03367 sā yogyatā iti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1387: 03368 sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
SA15dhkprvku:1388: 03368 tad-anyasya api hetutve kathaṃ syād viṣaya-ākṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1390: 03369 pitros tad ekasya ākāraṃ dhatte na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1392: 03370 viṣayatvaṃ tad-aṅgena tad-abhāve na tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1396: 03372 sā vā anityā na jātiḥ syān nityā vā janikā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1397: 03373 nāma-ādikaṃ niṣiddhaṃ prāṅ na ayam arthavatāṃ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1399: 03374 smṛtiś ca īdṛgvidhaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāś ca anubhavād bhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1400: 03374 sa ca artha-ākāra-rahitaḥ sā idānīṃ tadvatī katham
SA15dhkprvku:1401: 03375 na arthād bhāvas tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1402: 03375 ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa-ākāra-vivekataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1403: 03376 vyatiriktaṃ tam ākāraṃ pratīyād aparas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1404: 03376 nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:1405: 03377 ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhir na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1408: 03378 bhinna-ātma-arthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyas tadā syād dhīr anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1411: 03380 anyathā hy atad-ākāraṃ kathaṃ jñāne adhirohati
SA15dhkprvku:1412: 03380 eka-ākāra-uttaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā hy uttaram uttaram
SA15dhkprvku:1413: 03381 tasya artha-rūpeṇa ākārāv ātma-ākāraś ca kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1416: 03382 bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotir manaskāre ca sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1417: 03383 sarveṣām api kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1420: 03384 sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syād dṛṣṭeś ca yamala-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1425: 03387 anyathā hy ādyam eva ekaṃ saṃyojyeta artha-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:1428: 03388 viṣayasya tato anyatvaṃ kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:1429: 03389 bhedaś ca bhrānti-vijñānair dṛśyeta indāv iva advaye
SA15dhkprvku:1431: 03390 na artho asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1432: 03390 dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayor na asti vivekitā
SA15dhkprvku:1435: 03392 abhāvād akṣa-buddhīnāṃ satsv apy anyeṣu hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1436: 03392 niyamaṃ yadi na brūyāt pratyayāt samanantarāt
SA15dhkprvku:1440: 03394 buddhir āśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1441: 03395 anagni-janyo dhūmaḥ syāt tat-kāryāt kāraṇe agatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1442: 03395 na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1444: 03396 gamayed agni-nirbhāsāṃ dhiyam eva na pāvakam
SA15dhkprvku:1446: 03397 vyanakti citta-santāno dhiyaṃ dhūmo agnitas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1447: 03398 asty eṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyaṃ tv āśritya varṇyate
SA15dhkprvku:1452: 03400 sarvaṃ tad-artham arthāc cet tasya na asti tad-ābhatā
SA15dhkprvku:1454: 03401 tasya kenacid aṃśena parato api bhidā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1455: 03402 tathā hy āśritya pitaraṃ tad-rūpo api sutaḥ pituḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1460: 03404 bhūtaṃ paśyaṃś ca tad-darśī kathaṃ ca upahata-indriyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1461: 03405 śodhitaṃ timireṇa asya vyaktaṃ cakṣur atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:1462: 03405 paśyato anya-akṣa-dṛśye arthe tad-avyaktaṃ kathaṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1464: 03406 śaktir hetus tato na anyo ahetuś ca viṣayaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1465: 03407 sa eva yadi dhī-hetuḥ kiṃ pradīpam apekṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1466: 03407 dīpa-mātreṇa sadbhāvād ubhayaṃ na api kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1468: 03408 tat syād āloka-bhedāc cet tat pidhāna-apidhānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1469: 03409 tulyā dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭir vā sūkṣmo aṃśas tasya kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1470: 03409 ālokena na mandena dṛśyate ato bhidā yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1474: 03411 bhinne anyasminn abhinnasya kuto bhedena bhāsanam
SA15dhkprvku:1475: 03412 mandaṃ tad api tejaḥ kim āvṛtter iha sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1476: 03412 tanutvāt tejaso apy etad asty anyatra apy atānavam
SA15dhkprvku:1477: 03413 atyāsanne ca suvyaktaṃ tejas tat syād atisphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:1478: 03413 tatra apy adṛṣṭam āśritya bhaved rūpa-antaraṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1479: 03414 anyonya-āvaraṇāt teṣāṃ syāt tejo vihatis tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1480: 03414 tatra ekam eva dṛśyeta tasya anāvaraṇe sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1481: 03415 paśyet sphuṭa-asphuṭaṃ rūpam eko adṛṣṭena vāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:1482: 03415 artha-anarthau na yena stas tad-adṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim
SA15dhkprvku:1487: 03418 vyaktiḥ kuto asatāṃ jñānād anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1488: 03418 vyaktau vyajyeta sarvo arthas tad-hetor niyamo yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1489: 03419 na eṣā api kalpanā jñāne jñānaṃ tv artha-avabhāsataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1490: 03419 taṃ vyanakti iti kathyeta tad-abhāve api tat-kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:1491: 03420 na ākārayati ca anyo artho anupakārāt saha-uditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1492: 03420 vyakto na ākārayan jñānaṃ sva-ākāreṇa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1493: 03421 vajra-upala-ādir apy arthaḥ sthiraḥ so anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:1494: 03421 sakṛt sarvasya janayej jñānāni jagataḥ samam
SA15dhkprvku:1496: 03422 āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo atra api pūrvavat
SA15dhkprvku:1497: 03423 saṃvedanasya tādātmye na vivādo asti kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1498: 03423 tasya artha-rūpatā siddhā sā api sidhyati saṃsmṛteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1500: 03424 evam etan na khalv evam iti sā syān na bhedinī
SA15dhkprvku:1501: 03425 na ca anubhava-mātreṇa kaścid bhedo vivecakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1502: 03425 vivekinī na ca aspaṣṭa-bhede dhīr yamala-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1505: 03427 dhiyā atadrūpayā jñāne niruddhe anubhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1506: 03427 svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vetti ity utsanno anubhavo arthinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1507: 03428 bahir mukhaṃ ca taj-jñānaṃ bhāty artha-pratibhāsa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1508: 03428 buddheś ca grāhikā buddhir nityam antarmukhā-ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:1509: 03429 yo yasya viṣaya-ābhāsas taṃ vetti na tad ity api
SA15dhkprvku:1510: 03429 prāptā kā saṃvid anyā asti tādrūpyād iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:1512: 03430 buddhiḥ sarūpā tad-vic cet na idānīṃ vit-sarūpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1513: 03431 svayaṃ so anubhavas tasyā na sa sārūpya-kāraṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1517: 03433 dhiyo nīla-ādi-rūpatve bāhyo arthaḥ kiṃ pramāṇakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1518: 03433 dhiyo anīla-ādi-rūpatve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1520: 03434 siddhaṃ tat svata eva asya kim arthena upanīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1521: 03435 sarvātmanā hi sārūpye jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
SA15dhkprvku:1522: 03435 sāmye kenacid aṅgena syāt sarvaṃ sarva-vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1524: 03436 tathā anubhava-rūpatvāt tasya apy anubhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1525: 03437 na anubhūto anubhava ity artha-vat tad-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1526: 03437 tasmād adoṣa iti cet na arthe apy asty eṣa sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:1527: 03438 kasmād vā anubhave na asti sati sattā-nibandhane
SA15dhkprvku:1528: 03438 api ca idaṃ yad ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita-ādike
SA15dhkprvku:1530: 03439 tat kiṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakteḥ pararūpam atha ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1531: 03440 pararūpe aprakāśāyāṃ vyaktau vyaktaṃ kathaṃ sitam
SA15dhkprvku:1532: 03440 jñānaṃ vyaktir na sā vyaktā ity avyaktam akhilaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:1534: 03441 dṛṣṭyā ca ajñāta-sambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1535: 03442 yasmād dvayor eka-gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1536: 03442 dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayor dṛṣṭau syād dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1537: 03443 sarūpaṃ darśanaṃ yasya dṛśyate anyena cetasā
SA15dhkprvku:1538: 03443 dṛṣṭa-ākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpye asya svavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1539: 03444 atha ātma-rūpan no vetti pararūpasya vit katham
SA15dhkprvku:1540: 03444 sārūpyād vedanā-ākhyā ca prāg eva pratipāditā
SA15dhkprvku:1541: 03445 dṛṣṭayor eva sārūpya-graho arthaṃ ca na dṛṣṭavān
SA15dhkprvku:1542: 03445 prāk kathaṃ darśanena asya sārūpyaṃ so adhyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:1543: 03446 sārūpyam api na icched yaḥ tasya na ubhaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1544: 03446 tadā artho jñānam iti ca jñāte ca iti gatā kathā
SA15dhkprvku:1545: 03447 atha svarūpaṃ sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1546: 03447 yat tasyām aprakāśāyām arthaḥ syād aprakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1548: 03448 apratyakṣāṃ dhiyaṃ prāhus te api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1551: 03450 pratyakṣās tad-viviktaṃ ca na anyat kiṃcid vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:1552: 03450 yat taj-jñānam paro apy enāṃ bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1553: 03451 tajjā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīr vetti na aparā
SA15dhkprvku:1554: 03451 ālambamānasya anyasya apy asty avaśyam idaṃ dvayam
SA15dhkprvku:1555: 03452 atha na utpadyate tasmān na ca tat pratibhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1556: 03452 sā dhīrn nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tad-agrahe
SA15dhkprvku:1557: 03453 na gṛhyata iti proktaṃ na ca tad-vastu kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1558: 03453 tasmād artha-avabhāso asau na anyas tasyā dhiyas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1560: 03454 na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kuto bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1562: 03455 sarvathā anyo na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedo apy apoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1563: 03456 yeṣāṃ ca yogino anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:1564: 03456 vidanti tulya-anubhavās tadvat te api syur āturāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1566: 03457 na udeti duḥkham iti cet na vai duḥkha-samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1569: 03459 bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā
SA15dhkprvku:1570: 03459 na tad-ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadā evaṃ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1572: 03460 artha-sārūpyam ālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sphuṭaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1573: 03461 api ca adhyakṣatā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāl liṅgato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1574: 03461 tac ca akṣam artho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1577: 03463 tathā artho dhī-manaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1578: 03463 na aprasiddhasya liṅgatvaṃ vyaktir arthasya cen matā
SA15dhkprvku:1579: 03464 liṅgaṃ sā eva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto artho anena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1581: 03465 atha arthasya eva kaścit sa viśeṣo vyaktir iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1583: 03466 tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1584: 03466 sa ca jñāto athavā ajñāto bhavej jñātasya liṅgatā
SA15dhkprvku:1585: 03467 yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñāto asāv iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1586: 03467 jñātatvena aparicchinnam api tad gamakaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1587: 03468 adṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:1588: 03468 viśeṣaḥ so anya-dṛṣṭāv apy asti iti syāt sva-dhī-gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1590: 03469 kevalān na artha-dharmāt kaḥ sva-dharmaḥ sva-dhiyo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1592: 03470 tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddher vyabhicāry-anyajaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1594: 03471 muktvā na kāryam aparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1595: 03472 tatra atyakṣaṃ dvayaṃ pañcasv artheṣv eko api na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1597: 03473 yad evam apratītaṃ tal liṅgam ity apy alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:1598: 03473 vidyamāne api liṅge tāṃ tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1599: 03474 kathaṃ pratīti-liṅgaṃ hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam
SA15dhkprvku:1600: 03474 tata eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddher upavarṇane
SA15dhkprvku:1602: 03475 ity arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1604: 03476 pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ca iṣṭa-abhidhā-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:1605: 03477 para-citta-anumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1607: 03478 prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhir buddhy-antareṇa vaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1610: 03479 sa ca prakāśas tad-rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1611: 03480 tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ svavedikā
SA15dhkprvku:1612: 03480 siddhā anyathā tulya-dharmā viṣayo api dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:1613: 03481 iti prakāśa-rūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1615: 03482 sādṛśye api hi dhīr anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
SA15dhkprvku:1620: 03484 tasmād yato ayaṃ tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1621: 03485 smṛter apy ātmavit siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
SA15dhkprvku:1624: 03486 varṇaḥ syād akramo dīrghaḥ kramavān akramāṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1626: 03487 akrameṇa grahād anta-krama-vad dhīś ca no bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1627: 03488 āntyaṃ pūrva-sthitād ūrdhvaṃ vardhamāno dhvanir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1628: 03489 sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1630: 03490 sakṛd yatna-udbhavād vyarthaḥ syād yatnaś ca uttarottaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1631: 03490 vyaktāv apy eṣa varṇānāṃ doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1632: 03491 anekayā tad-grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1633: 03491 na dīrgha-grāhikā sā ca tan na syād dīrgha-dhī-smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1634: 03492 pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau tad-dhvaniḥ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1635: 03492 avicchinna-ābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:1636: 03493 vicchinnaṃ śṛṇvato apy asya yady avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1642: 03496 eka-aṇv-atyaya-kālaś ca kālo alpīyān kṣaṇo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1643: 03496 buddhiś ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate
SA15dhkprvku:1645: 03497 vicchinnā apy anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitatha-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1646: 03498 ghaṭanaṃ yac ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya-vibhramāt
SA15dhkprvku:1649: 03499 na akṣa-grāhye asti śabdānāṃ yojanā iti vivecitam
SA15dhkprvku:1650: 03500 vicchinnaṃ paśyato apy akṣair ghaṭayed yadi kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1651: 03500 arthasya tat saṃvitteś ca satataṃ bhāsamānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1652: 03501 bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1653: 03501 buddhīnāṃ śakti-niyamād iti cet sa kuto mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1654: 03502 yugapad buddhy-adṛṣṭeś cet tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1656: 03503 tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama-bhāvinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1658: 03504 spaṣṭa-avabhāsāaṃ pratyakṣāṃ kalpayet so api vāritaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1660: 03505 pratīta-bhede apy adhyakṣā dhīḥ kathaṃ tādṛśī bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1663: 03506 sa eva ayam iti jñānaṃ na asti tac ca akṣaje kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1664: 03507 na ca artha-jñāna-saṃvittyor yugapat sambhavo yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1665: 03507 lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha-artha-jñānayoḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:1666: 03508 na hy artha-ābhāsi ca jñānam artho bāhyaś ca kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1668: 03509 sūpalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau
SA15dhkprvku:1669: 03509 artha-artha-pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
SA15dhkprvku:1673: 03511 na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaved arthasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1674: 03512 tathā hi nīla-ādy-ākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1675: 03512 lakṣyate na tu nīla-ābhe vedane vedanaṃ param
SA15dhkprvku:1676: 03513 jñāna-antareṇa anubhavo bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1677: 03513 dṛṣṭā tad-vedanaṃ kena tasya apy anyena ced imām
SA15dhkprvku:1678: 03514 mālāṃ jñāna-vidāṃ ko ayaṃ janayaty anubandhinīm
SA15dhkprvku:1679: 03514 pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva cen na syāt saṃcāro viṣaya-antare
SA15dhkprvku:1681: 03515 agṛhītvā uttaraṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād aparaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1682: 03516 ātmani jñāna-janane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām
SA15dhkprvku:1683: 03516 ko nāma anyo vibadhnīyād bahir-aṅge antaraṅgikām
SA15dhkprvku:1684: 03517 bāhyaḥ saṃnihito apy arthaḥ tāṃ vibandhuṃ hi na prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1685: 03517 dhiyaṃ na anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya saṃnidhau
SA15dhkprvku:1686: 03518 na ca saṃnihita-arthā asti daśā kācid ato dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1687: 03518 utsanna-mūlā smṛtir apy utsannā ity ujjvalaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1691: 03520 viṣaya-antara-saṃcāro yadi sā eva artha-dhīḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1692: 03521 śakti-kṣaye pūrva-dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāg dhiyā vinā
SA15dhkprvku:1696: 03523 na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyaṃ mano-vṛtter mano antaram
SA15dhkprvku:1698: 03524 ekatvān manaso anyasmin saktasya anya-agater yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1700: 03525 samavṛttau ca tulyatvāt sarvadā anya-agatir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1701: 03525 janma ca ātma-mano yoga-mātrajānāṃ sakṛd bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1702: 03526 ekā eva cet kriyā ekaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo aneka-darśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1703: 03526 krameṇa api na śaktaṃ syāt paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1704: 03527 anena deha puruṣāv uktau saṃskārato yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1705: 03527 niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścād buddheś ced astu sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:1706: 03528 na grāhyatā anyā jananāj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1707: 03528 agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo asti na ca saukṣmya-ādy-anaṃśake
SA15dhkprvku:1709: 03529 grāhyatāyā na khalv anyaj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:1710: 03530 sākṣān na hy anyathā buddhe rūpa-ādir upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1712: 03531 buddher api tad asti iti sā api tattve vyavasthitā
SA15dhkprvku:1714: 03532 rūpa-ādeś cetasaś ca evam aviśuddha-dhiyaṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1717: 03533 rūpa-ādi-buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:1718: 03534 sati sva-dhī-grahe tasmāt sā eva anantara-hetutā
SA15dhkprvku:1719: 03534 cetaso grāhyatā sā eva tato na artha-antarā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1721: 03535 prakṛtyā eva iti gaditaṃ nānā-ekasmān na ced bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1722: 03536 na kiṃcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarva-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1723: 03536 ekaṃ syād api sāmagrayor ity uktaṃ tad anekakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1724: 03537 arthaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād yadi dhīḥ parā
SA15dhkprvku:1727: 03538 dvir dvir ekaṃ ca bhāseta bhāsanād ātma-tad-vidoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1730: 03540 ātma-anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na anubhūtaṃ parair yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1731: 03540 ātma-anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛto yena evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1732: 03541 vyakti-hetv-aprasiddhiḥ syān na vyakter vyaktam icchataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1733: 03541 vyakty-asiddhāv api vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktam idaṃ jagat

SA15dhkprvku:2051: 04159 gurutvaṃ kāryam ālāya yadi na eva upalakṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2052: 04160 ā sarṣapād gurutvaṃ tad durlakṣitam analpakam
SA15dhkprvku:2054: 04161 nanv adṛṣṭo aṃśu-vat so artho na ca tat-kāryam īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2059: 04163 udāharaṇam apy anyad diśā gamyam yathoktayā
SA15dhkprvku:2061: 04164 tathā param pratinyastam sādhyaṃ na iṣṭaṃ tadā api tat
SA15dhkprvku:2063: 04165 tasmāt sādhya-śrutirn na iṣṭaṃ viśeṣam avalambate
SA15dhkprvku:2066: 04167 sarvasya ca aprasiddhatvāt kathaṃcit tena na kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2073: 04170 śāstreṇa alaṃ yathāyogaṃ loka eva pravartatām
SA15dhkprvku:2077: 04172 vyarthā vyāpti-phalā sā uktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2080: 04174 pakṣa-doṣaḥ para-apekṣo na iti ca pratipāditam
SA15dhkprvku:2081: 04174 iṣṭa-asambhavy-asiddhaś ca sa eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2083: 04175 dṛṣṭānta-ākhyān ato anyat kim asty atra artha-anudarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:2085: 04176 na tad-vyāpteḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyena anuvartane
SA15dhkprvku:2086: 04177 syān nirākaraṇaṃ śabde sthitena eva ity ato abravīt
SA15dhkprvku:2087: 04177 viruddha-viṣaye anyasmin vadann āha anyatāṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2088: 04178 sā ca bheda-apratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2089: 04178 vṛkṣo na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:2090: 04179 sarva-śruter eka-vṛttirn niṣedhaḥ syān na tāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:2094: 04181 sarvatra doṣas tulyaś cen na saṃvṛtyā viśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2100: 04184 dharmī dharmāś ca bhāsante vyavahāras tad-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2102: 04185 sādhyaḥ sādhanatāṃ nītas tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2105: 04187 pakṣa-aṅgatve apy abādhatvān na asiddhir bhinna-dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:2106: 04187 yathā aśvo na viṣāṇitvād eṣa piṇḍo viṣāṇavān
SA15dhkprvku:2107: 04188 sādhya-kāla-aṅgatā vā na nivṛtter upalakṣya tat
SA15dhkprvku:2108: 04188 viśeṣo api pratijñā-artho dharma-bhedān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2111: 04190 ayogaṃ yogam aparair atyantāyogam eva ca
SA15dhkprvku:2114: 04191 vivakṣāto prayoge api tasya artho ayaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2116: 04192 pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojam iti vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:2123: 04196 na hi svabhāvād anyena vyāptir gamyasya kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:2125: 04197 prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na
SA15dhkprvku:2129: 04199 etena eva prasiddho api svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2130: 04199 kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:2132: 04200 prabheda-mātram ākhyātaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2133: 04201 tena atra kārya-liṅgena svabhāvo apy ekadeśa-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:2135: 04202 yan nāntarīyakā sattā yo vā ātmā svo avibhāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:2136: 04202 sa tena avyabhicārī syād ity arthaṃ tat prabhedanam
SA15dhkprvku:2137: 04203 saṃyogy-ādiṣu yeṣv asti pratibandho na tādṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:2138: 04203 na te hetava ity uktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:2139: 04204 sati vā pratibandhes tu sa eva gati-sādhanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2140: 04204 niyamo hy avinābhāvo anityaś ca na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:2142: 04205 tac ca na apratibaddheṣu tata eva anvaya-sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2143: 04206 svātmatve hetu-bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā
SA15dhkprvku:2144: 04206 sidhyaty ato viśeṣe na vyatireko na ca anvayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2146: 04207 uktā anaikāntikas tasmād anyathā gamako bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2148: 04208 ātmano vinivarteta prāṇa-ādir yadi tac ca na
SA15dhkprvku:2150: 04209 tadātmā tat-prasūtaś cen na etad ātma-upalambhane
SA15dhkprvku:2151: 04210 tasya upalabdhāv agatāv agatau ca prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2152: 04210 te ca atyantaparokṣasya dṛṣṭy-adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2153: 04211 anyatra adṛṣṭa-rūpasya ghaṭa-ādau na iti vā kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2155: 04212 prāṇa-ādeś ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2156: 04212 tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2157: 04213 yasya hetor abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇo na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:2158: 04213 dehe api yady asau na syād yukto dehena sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2159: 04214 bhinne api kiṃcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2160: 04214 prameyatvād ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ sātmatvaṃ kiṃ na mīyate
SA15dhkprvku:2161: 04215 aniṣṭaṃ cet pramāṇaṃ hi sarva-iṣṭīnāṃ nibandhanam
SA15dhkprvku:2162: 04215 bhāva-abhāva-vyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2168: 04218 na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke api cet katham
SA15dhkprvku:2169: 04219 na asādhyād eva viśleṣas tasya nanv evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:2170: 04219 sādhye anuvṛtty-abhāvo arthāt tasya anyatra apy asau samaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2171: 04220 asādhyād eva viccheda iti sādhye astitā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:2172: 04220 arthāpattyā ata eva uktam ekena dvaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:2175: 04222 nivṛttirn na asataḥ sādhyād asādhyeṣv eva no tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2176: 04222 na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtter asato matā
SA15dhkprvku:2177: 04223 nivṛtty-abhāvas tu vidhir vastu-bhāvo asato api san
SA15dhkprvku:2178: 04223 vastv-abhāvas tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya-vijṛmbhitam
SA15dhkprvku:2179: 04224 nivṛttir yadi tasmin na hetor vṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2180: 04224 sā api na pratiṣedho ayaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2181: 04225 vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo asti na aparaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2182: 04225 vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūkatā
SA15dhkprvku:2183: 04226 satāṃ ca na niṣedho asti so asatsu ca na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2184: 04226 jagaty anena nyāyena nañ-arthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2185: 04227 deśa-kāla-niṣedhaś ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2186: 04227 na tathā na yathā so asti tathā api na niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2189: 04229 tābhyāṃ sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāty-abhāve api tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2190: 04229 śabda-pravṛtter asti iti so api iṣṭo vyavahāra-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:2196: 04232 vidhāv ekasya tad-bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:2197: 04233 niṣedhe tad-viviktaṃ ca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:2201: 04235 tat-phalo atat-phalaś ca artho bhinna ekas tatas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2204: 04236 dṛṣṭiṃ bheda-āśrayais te api tasmād ajñāta-viplavāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2205: 04237 sattā-sādhana-vṛtteś ca sandigdhaḥ syād asan na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2206: 04237 asattvaṃ ca abhyupagamād apramāṇān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2210: 04239 dvairāśye saty adṛṣṭe api syād adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2213: 04241 bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandehaṃ nivartayet
SA15dhkprvku:2214: 04241 kvacid viniyamāt ko anyas tat-kārya-ātmatayā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:2215: 04242 nairātmyād api tena asya sandigdhaṃ vinivartanam
SA15dhkprvku:2216: 04242 astu nāma tathā apy ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2217: 04243 yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvaṃ bhāvam icchati
SA15dhkprvku:2218: 04243 yathā na avyatireke api prāṇa-ādirn na sapakṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2219: 04244 sapakṣa-avyatirekī ced hetur hetur ato anvayī
SA15dhkprvku:2220: 04244 na anvayy avyatirekī ced anairātmyaṃ na sātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:2221: 04245 yan nāntarīyakaḥ svātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:2222: 04245 nivartakaḥ sa eva ataḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2224: 04246 kārye dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭiś ca kāryakāraṇatā hi te
SA15dhkprvku:2228: 04248 tair vinā bhavato anyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2230: 04249 sā cen na bhedikā prāptam eka-rūpam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:2233: 04251 tat tasya ajananaṃ rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā
SA15dhkprvku:2234: 04251 na tasya ajananaṃ rūpaṃ tat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham
SA15dhkprvku:2236: 04252 tasmāt sva-dṛṣṭāv iva tad dṛṣṭe kārye api gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:2238: 04253 drava-śakter yataḥ kledaḥ sā tv ekā eva dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:2239: 04254 bhinna-abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinno atha dravatā katham
SA15dhkprvku:2240: 04254 abhinnā ity ucyate buddhes tad-rūpāyā abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2242: 04255 yena aṃśena adadhad dhūmaṃ tena aṃśena tathā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2244: 04256 dhūmo atad-vyabhicāri iti siddhaṃ kāryaṃ tathā param
SA15dhkprvku:2246: 04257 anagniś ced adhūmo asau sadhūmaś cet sapāvakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2252: 04260 siddha-udāharaṇā ity ukta-anupalabdhiḥ pṛthag na tu
SA15dhkprvku:2253: 04261 tatra apy adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa-āder anivartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2256: 04262 vastuny api tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2257: 04263 tatra upalabhyeṣv astitvam upalabdher na ca aparam
SA15dhkprvku:2261: 04265 tathā anyā na upalabhyeṣu na astitā anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2263: 04266 siddho hi vyavahāro ayaṃ dṛśya-adṛṣṭāv asann iti
SA15dhkprvku:2264: 04266 tasyāḥ siddhāv asandigdhau tat-kāryatve api dhī-dhvanī
SA15dhkprvku:2265: 04267 vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohād atra ananubruvan
SA15dhkprvku:2272: 04270 buddher upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2273: 04271 viśeṣo gamyate arthānāṃ viśiṣṭād eva vedanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2275: 04272 tasmāt svato dhiyor bheda-siddhis tābhyāṃ tad-arthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2276: 04272 anyathā hy anavasthānād bhedaḥ sidhyen na kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:2279: 04274 tasmād anupalambho ayaṃ svayaṃ pratyakṣato gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2284: 04276 yathā aliṅgo anya-sattveṣu vikalpa-ādir na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2285: 04277 aniścaya-phalā hy eṣā na alaṃ vyāvṛtti-sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:2286: 04277 ādyā adhikriyate hetor niścayena eva sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:2287: 04278 tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2293: 04281 nāśanaṃ janayitvā anyaṃ sa hetus tasya nāśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2294: 04281 tam eva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2295: 04282 ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha-ātmanaḥ sataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2296: 04282 na ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2297: 04283 anapekṣaś ca kiṃ bhāvo atathābhūtaḥ kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:2298: 04283 yathā na kṣepa-bhāg iṣṭaḥ sa eva udbhūta-nāśakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2299: 04284 kṣaṇam apy anapekṣatve bhāvo bhāvasya na iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:2300: 04284 bhāvo hi sa tathābhūto abhāve bhāvas tathā katham
SA15dhkprvku:2306: 04286 prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva sva-dehe jarām
